Quiz.question: 1.Which of the following is not part of aircraft safety system?
2.Which of the following are cabin safety equipment?
3.Which of the following is intra-communication system of an aircraft?
4.Which of the following is not cockpit safety system?
5.What is to be done when the aircraft is going through fueling with passengers on board?

choice.b: b.Passengers will have to leave the aircraft, and wait to be reboarded.
choice.c: c.Passengers will have to be told by flight attendants to release seat belt, remain seated, and do not smoke.

Quiz.question: 6.Which of the following is an example of emergency briefing to passengers?

choice.a: a.Briefing to passengers seated at the emergency exit row
choice.b: b.Briefing to passengers about the usage of on board equipment
choice.c: c.Briefing to passengers about where on board facilities are
